title: chore: pin Node LTS for stable tooling
description: Node v25 introduces an experimental global localStorage/webstorage implementation. In Vitest, simply touching globalThis.localStorage can trigger warnings about missing --localstorage-file. We patched tests to avoid the getter, but long-term stability is better served by pinning this repo to a Node LTS version (e.g., 20 or 22) using .nvmrc / .node-version / Volta. This reduces CI and developer environment drift and avoids unexpected runtime/tooling regressions.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add Node version pin file (.nvmrc or .node-version) targeting LTS
- Update README/WORKFLOW docs to mention required Node version
- Confirm pnpm dev/test/build run clean on pinned Node
- (Optional) Add CI check to enforce Node version
